Note -- this readme has been added by the Photoshop Elements team, and is not distributed with SQLite.

SQLite is a small database library specifically designed for embedded application use.  This folder contains SQLite version 3.5.1

The source code for sQLite has been released to the public domain, so we are free to modify it.

Information on SQLite can be obtained at:
http://www.sqlite.org/

And information on copyright at:
http://www.sqlite.org/copyright.html
